 Fixed Outputs. The number of output variables is also ﬁxed; although a more subtle
issue, it means that for each input pattern, one output must be produced.
Sequences pose a challenge for [deep neural networks] because they require that the
dimensionality of the inputs and outputs is known and ﬁxed.
— Sequence to Sequence Learning with Neural Networks , 2014.
Feedforward neural networks do oﬀer great capability but still suﬀer from this key limitation
